zh-cn: 阿历山大·日成诺维奇·金

birth_place.zh-cn: 苏联俄罗斯哈巴罗夫斯克维亚茨科耶村
birth_place.en: Vyatskoye, Khabarovsk, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 金日成与金正淑的第二个儿子，金正日的弟弟。1947年夏天因溺水身亡。
description.en: The second son of Kim Il-sung and Kim Jong-suk, and the younger brother of Kim Jong-il. He drowned in the summer of 1947.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人，金万日的父亲。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and the father of Kim Man-il.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，金日成的第二任妻子，金万日的母亲。
description.en: A North Korean political figure, the second wife of Kim Il-sung, and the mother of Kim Man-il.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第二代最高领导人，金万日的兄长。
description.en: The second supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and the older brother of Kim Man-il.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，金日成与金正淑的女儿，金万日的妹妹。
description.en: A North Korean political figure, the daughter of Kim Il-sung and Kim Jong-suk, and the younger sister of Kim Man-il.

description.zh-cn: 一个存在于1922年至1991年的欧亚大陆社会主义国家，是金万日的出生国。
description.en: A socialist state in Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991. It was the country of birth for Kim Man-il.

nodes.id: 俄罗斯苏维埃社会主义联邦共和国

zh-cn: 俄罗斯苏维埃社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏联最大的加盟共和国，金万日出生于此地。
description.en: The largest constituent republic of the Soviet Union, where Kim Man-il was born.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯远东地区的城市，金万日出生于此地附近的村庄。
description.en: A city in the Russian Far East, near which Kim Man-il was born.

description.zh-cn: 位于俄罗斯哈巴罗夫斯克附近的村庄，是金万日的出生地，也可能是其溺亡地点。
description.en: A village near Khabarovsk, Russia, which is the birthplace of Kim Man-il and also his likely place of death by drowning.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的首都。有资料称金万日可能是在此地溺亡，但可能性不大。
description.en: The capital of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Some sources suggest Kim Man-il may have drowned here, although it is considered unlikely.

description.zh-cn: 金日成是金万日的父亲。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was Kim Man-il's father.

description.zh-cn: 金正淑是金万日的母亲。
description.en: Kim Jong-suk was Kim Man-il's mother.

description.zh-cn: 金正日是金万日的兄长。
description.en: Kim Jong-il was Kim Man-il's older brother.

description.zh-cn: 金庆喜是金万日的妹妹。
description.en: Kim Kyong-hui was Kim Man-il's younger sister.

description.zh-cn: 金万日于1944年出生于苏联哈巴罗夫斯克的维亚茨科耶村。
description.en: Kim Man-il was born in 1944 in the village of Vyatskoye, Khabarovsk, Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 根据朝鲜官方传记，金万日与兄长金正日关系很好。
description.en: According to official North Korean biography, Kim Man-il had a very good relationship with his older brother, Kim Jong-il.
